attributes.action: Stop people who aren't British challenging the government on internal affairs
attributes.background: Somebody from Brazil was able to stop the British government from acting in the interests of British people. When the British people had voted for the government to do so . Which is a disgrace .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
